InvoiceDocument.name: InvoiceDocument
InvoiceDocument.description: Represents the PDF document generated for an invoice.

ContentDocumentId.description: The ID of the generated PDF document.

DateGenerated.description: The date on which the PDF is generated.

DocumentGenerationProcessId.description: The ID of the document generation process that contains the information used to create the PDF invoice.

DocumentNumber.description: Required. A unique number assigned to the PDF invoice document.

ErrorMessage.description: Any errors that occur during PDF generation.

InvoiceId.description: Required. The ID of the Invoice to which the Invoice Doc is attached.

Status.description: The status of the PDF generation process.
